channel.title: [Turbo] - Courtroom Lies I - Yellow Poppy win!
channel.description:
**Welcome to [Turbo] - Courtroom Lies I**
Hosted by @KyoDaz
This setup follows simple forum rules. The setup will start [date=2019-10-11 time=02:00:00 timezone="Europe/London"] and once seven players have signed up. The setup will start on day one. There is a day one lynch.
**Gameplay**
Days will be 15 minutes long. Nights will be 7 minutes long. All actions must be done in your rolecard. The town alignment is the [color=#FFD505]Yellow Poppy[/color]. The mafia alignment is the [color=#FFF1E6]White Primrose[/color]. The [color=#FFF1E6]White Primrose[/color] automatically win once majority is reached. The [color=#FFF1E6]White Primrose[/color] can only communicate during the night. The [color=#FFF1E6]White Primrose[/color] have a compulsive faction kill. The [color=#FFF1E6]White Primrose[/color] are unaware of their partner's identity until night one.
**Executions**
To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" Executions will be plurality. Players are not lynched until the end of the day unless all votes are received. Lynches are mandatory. A no-lynch will instead in a random member of the [color=#FFD505]Yellow Poppy[/color] lynched. Ties in the votes are considered no-lynch.
Please ask if you are unsure of any lynch scenarios.
**To Join**
To join, please '**/in**'
**Rolelist**
[color=#FFD505]Villager[/color] [color=#FFD505]Villager[/color] [color=#FFD505]Villager[/color] [color=#FFD505]Judge[/color] [color=#FFD505]Orator[/color] [color=#FFF1E6]Apprentice[/color] [color=#FFF1E6]Apprentice[/color]
**Role Cards**
[details="Yellow Poppy Faction"] ># [color=#FFD505]Villager[/color] > You have no special abilities except your vote and voice. > Defeat all members of the [color=#FFF1E6]White Primrose[/color].
># [color=#FFD505]Judge[/color] > During the twilight phase you may decide to change the lynch. You can only use this ability once. > Defeat all members of the [color=#FFF1E6]White Primrose[/color].
># [color=#FFD505]Orator[/color] > During the day you may send an infinite amount of anonymous messages through the host. > Defeat all members of the [color=#FFF1E6]White Primrose[/color].
[/details]
[details="Primrose Faction"] > # [color=#FFF1E6]Apprentice[/color] > You have no special abilities except your vote and voice. > Defeat all members of the [color=#FFD505]Yellow Poppy[/color]. [/details]
Players:
1. Luxy - Died D3 - [color=#FFF1E6]Apprentice[/color] 2. Magnus - Died N1 - [color=#FFD505]Villager[/color] 3. Maxwell - Alive - [color=#FFD505]Villager[/color] 4. Marshal - Died D1 - [color=#FFF1E6]Apprentice[/color] 5. James - Died N2 - [color=#FFD505]Orator[/color] 6. Shurian - Alive - [color=#FFD505]Judge[/color] 7. Datbird - Died D2 - [color=#FFD505]Villager[/color]

item.title: [Turbo] - Courtroom Lies I - Yellow Poppy win!
item.dc:creator: MaximusPrime
item.description:
i’d say they can get into 3 but they hover more around 1.5-2.5 bc sometimes they do stupid things from their overconfidence but they’re generally on track and know what they’re doing, but probs hover more around 2-2.5 (if they don’t let their emotions control their play)

haven’t seen math in a long while tho

Read full topic
item.source: [Turbo] - Courtroom Lies I - Yellow Poppy win!

sometimes u do some good plays, sometimes u just brain fart but ur better than many players including me so

item.title: [Turbo] - Courtroom Lies I - Yellow Poppy win!
item.dc:creator: Luxy
item.description:
Arete:

Everyone was very suspicious of Alice as Mastermind the next day and she wound up having to out herself, at which point Kape grand trialed her, and since King vote counted for two him + Maxwell + Dat + Possessed the Fool were able to mislynch her; it basically turned into a race of whether town or scum could vote faster.

Which is undersireable tbh.

Less mafia more who is online

Read full topic
item.source: [Turbo] - Courtroom Lies I - Yellow Poppy win!

item.title: [Turbo] - Courtroom Lies I - Yellow Poppy win!
item.dc:creator: Arete
item.description:
Dat got redchecked N1 and everyone basically believed it but Alice (who was Prince fakeclaiming Princess) convinced us that Lymphoma was Mastermind, and Lymphoma being himself lowkey gamethrew resulting in his mislynch. We’d come up with a plan where Possessed the Drunk claim would HH Dat while HTM shot him (HTM was Archer), but Possessed was actually Fool so he obviously did not in fact occupy Datbird, and Kape guarded Dat so he survived. Scum, having missed their N1 convert, attempted to convert Alice N2, meaning they were going into D3 with no convert; Eevee the NK had claimed Prince and got jailexe’d N2. Also, we’d massclaimed so Dat was able to kill both TK’s.

Everyone was very suspicious of Alice as Mastermind the next day and she wound up having to out herself, at which point Kape grand trialed her, and since King vote counted for two him + Maxwell + Dat + Possessed the Fool were able to mislynch her; it basically turned into a race of whether town or scum could vote faster.

Read full topic
item.source: [Turbo] - Courtroom Lies I - Yellow Poppy win!

item.dc:creator: Luxy
item.description:
You aren’t a level 0 town though. Hja can be scumread by 1 irl day into day 1 and lynched that day. You can survive longer than 1 game day for sure.

Being caught D1 sometimes isn’t indicative of skill level, crazy things happen.
